The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: This was a great overview for the way Islam spread throughout much of Africa, Asia, and parts of Europe in just a few centuries. It challenges the notion that Islam was spread primarily through warfare or forced conversion and really puts into context early Islamic history until the mid 16th century.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: I would highly recommend this course - the subject material is very interesting and the primary sources are challenging yet rewarding to read.
